payload.content: Tensor Logic is a new programming language proposed by Pedro Domingos, intended to be the fundamental language for artificial intelligence.

name: Tensor Logic is a new programming language proposed by Pedro Domingos, intended
content: Tensor Logic is a new programming language proposed by Pedro Domingos, intended to be the fundamental language for artificial intelligence.

payload.content: Just as physics found its language in calculus and circuit design in Boolean logic, Pedro Domingos argues that Tensor Logic will serve as the missing fundamental language for AI.

name: Just as physics found its language in calculus and circuit design in Boolean log
content: Just as physics found its language in calculus and circuit design in Boolean logic, Pedro Domingos argues that Tensor Logic will serve as the missing fundamental language for AI.

payload.content: Current AI paradigms are split between Deep Learning (good at learning from data, poor at logical reasoning) and Symbolic AI (good at logical reasoning, poor at learning from messy real-world data), and these two do not integrate well.

name: Current AI paradigms are split between Deep Learning (good at learning from data
content: Current AI paradigms are split between Deep Learning (good at learning from data, poor at logical reasoning) and Symbolic AI (good at logical reasoning, poor at learning from messy real-world data), and these two do not integrate well.

payload.content: Tensor Logic unifies Deep Learning and Symbolic AI into a single language, allowing for learning and modification of logical rules, transparent and verifiable reasoning without hallucinations, and the mixing of fuzzy analogical thinking with deduction.

name: Tensor Logic unifies Deep Learning and Symbolic AI into a single language, allow
content: Tensor Logic unifies Deep Learning and Symbolic AI into a single language, allowing for learning and modification of logical rules, transparent and verifiable reasoning without hallucinations, and the mixing of fuzzy analogical thinking with deduction.

payload.content: Pedro Domingos claims that trillions of dollars have been wasted on brute-force compute in AI because companies are 'reinventing reasoning' instead of leveraging 40 years of existing AI research.

name: Pedro Domingos claims that trillions of dollars have been wasted on brute-force
content: Pedro Domingos claims that trillions of dollars have been wasted on brute-force compute in AI because companies are 'reinventing reasoning' instead of leveraging 40 years of existing AI research.

payload.content: Predicate Invention is the process by which a system learns to identify 'objects' from raw data, similar to how humans perceive objects rather than just pixels.

name: Predicate Invention is the process by which a system learns to identify 'objects
content: Predicate Invention is the process by which a system learns to identify 'objects' from raw data, similar to how humans perceive objects rather than just pixels.
